favourite.article: Whenever I am singing the song I feel relieved oh what a friend that taketh away my sins and gives me life.
Una de las mas HERMOSAS ALABANZAS QUE HE TENIDO EL PRIVILEGIO DE DELEITARME AL ESCUCHALA Y ALAVAR AL REY DE REYES Y SENOR DE SENORES. ( KING JESUS ) AMEN ALELUYA
This song is lovely!

I awoke this morning with the tune of this song in my heart. Since I'm more familiar with the words in Spanish, “Hallé un buen Amigo", I came here for the English language version. As I consider the words expressing such depth of the believer's experience and hope in Jesus, it amazes me to consider how such a beautiful song of praise and worship could ever be ignored, if not forgotten, by the church at large.
Wonderful experience during family devotion. Jesus is our all in all.
Lovely
These hymns are so inspiring! I Love You Lord, my everything, my life and all!
This song came to me afresh this morning after my personal devotion. I am ever indebted to Jesus my Saviour. This song is inspiring!

Song of Songs 2:3—As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, / So is my beloved among the sons Footnote on apple tree—The lover appreciates Christ as the source of rich provision (apple tree) who supplies her in a timely way. She is satisfied with her delight in resting (sitting down) under Christ as an overshadowing canopy in the day (shade — Isa. 4:5-6; 2 Cor. 12:9) and with her tasting Him as the sweet, timely supply (sweet fruit).
The lily of the valley and the bright and morning star is MY EVERYTHING. I call Him the Lord and God of GOODNESS.

Ever since I found a friend in Jesus, He (God) has been my best friend, He's my joy when am sad, my strength when am week, my hope when am hopeless, my sight in my dark hour, faithful when am unfaithful. He's everything, He's a friend that is closer than a brother to me.

Indeed Jesus is the Lily of the valley, the bright and morning star. What a consolation that someone cares about my troubles and sorrows. Jesus was a man of sorrows and carries my sorrows. Now I am free from troubles of life because Jesus has carried all my sorrows. Though Satan tempt me sore, I shall surely reach my goal through Jesus in Jesus Name. My goal is God Himself. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. All blessings.
The songs makes me happy and going for the day.
Never alone! God is Good, Sweet. One of my favourites and one of my Ringtones together with Amazing Grace.
I never knew this song was hiding somewhere in my spirit. I couldn't just stop singing it.

This hymn is and will always be a great blessing to my husband and I. I believe the LORD is happy to hear us praise HIS glory that rests on us and never fades away. I had the most wonderful opportunity to teach this hymn to the Children's prayer ministry in Kuwait. All glory, honour and praise to JESUS CHRIST.

Indeed Jesus is the Lily of the valley, the bright and morning star. What a consolation that someone cares about my troubles and sorrows. Jesus was a man of sorrows and carries my sorrows. Now I am free from troubles of life because Jesus has carried all my sorrows. Though Satan tempt me sore, I shall surely reach my goal through Jesus in Jesus Name. My goal is God Himself. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all.
I woke up with the song in my heart after singing thru, I found a deeper peace within my soul. But Can Jesus be apple tree of trees?

Praise the Lord, thank You Lord. I've found You. You're everything to me, and You are my fairest ten thousand to my soul. And all I need to cleanse me my fully whole and thank You Lord, in my sorrows You're my Comforter and You stayed in my troubles. Oh Lord Jesus, this song very enjoyable and I remembered this song when JESUS saved me and I baptised in 1972, CHURCH IN MAHAYAG, MINDANAO PHILLIPINES, at big river. Hallelujah amen. Amen amen.
Some of these words are not correct. Check the Pentecostal hymnal book; it is in there.
I agree, Joy, this hymn is uplifting. We've sang it in church a few times and each time there was clapping and exuberant singing.

I can always count on Hymnal.net for music to the most obscure of the hymns. This song has been requested by a dear faithful lady and I'm sure her's won't be the only soul rejoicing singing this old hymn! :)
This is my best song, I love it too much.
Thank Jesus.
My day is made glorious any day I sing this song on our family morning devotion, knowing and remembering that I have a friend in Jesus who is everything to me.
Oh! Yes I have found a Friend in Him. Hallelujah.

I love this song... Whenever I sing this song my heart overflows with the love of JESUS.... which has no boundaries.. and cannot be measured ... Amen... Hallelujah... The great healer and comfort .. JESUS LOVES YOU...
I gave this to my granddaughter as a gift, as I am her guardian angel. I am and always shall be the wind beneath her wings. May God's light shine upon her forever. Amen.
This song retrieves my soul back , He is my comforter in times of trouble. He is my strong tower!
Anytime l listen to this son l feel happy and my day is always full of joy and Peace of Mind.
Yes, The Lord will never leave us nor forsake us! Praise the Lord Jesus!
What a song; full of inspiration and comfort, a Friend that can never fail... I LOVE JESUS!

I woke up from sleep singing this hymn, when I woke up, I lost the wordings, I began to search for it in my hymn books but I couldn't find it, hence, I googled it and found it on this site. In fact, I was heavily burdened but felt relieved after I sang the Hymn. The Lord Jesus is truely a friend in times of need. Hallelujah.
Nice song. I sing this at school and I love it!!!!!!!!
Awesome song, inspiring tune. Our choir ministered this hymn as part of a medley on Jesus yesterday. I was really blessed.
This is total gospel.
God's promises are yea and amen.....glory to His name in the highest.
I think I agree with you. I have always known it to be "He's the lily of the valley."

"He’s the Apple-tree of trees, the Bright and Morning Star" I thought it should be, "He's the lily of the valley, the Bright and Morning Star". Can someone give more details. My church ministers gave me a scare when I used this lyrics instead of the "lily".
Am so blessed to have Jesus as a Friend. This song is so powerful, full of inspiration, satisfying, it gives me so much joy.
Best of all I have ever found. It blesses me much. Be blessed.
Wow, now who can say Jesus will leave anyone out of His kingdom? I'm blessed for JESUS gives me strength and this hymn. I'm not stopping though the world forsakes me.
Indeed I have found a friend in Jesus, He is everything I need.
Nothing could be as satisfying and fulfilling as having Jesus as everything! I'm blessed and encouraged each time I listen to/sing this hymn. Thanks for Your love, Jesus. ***happy***
Enjoying this song while hearing the verse Zech 2:5 "a wall of fire about her". What a consoling friend we have in Jesus! He is our defender, strengthening us, for His building!
When I listen to this song, I feel relieved. Indeed JESUS is everything to me. Let His love and mercy continue to fall on us.
Indeed Jesus is the only dependable and reliable Friend who will always be there when all fails. I just love this song. Makes me confident in life. Thank You Jesus for Your undying love towards me.
I love this song, when I heard it last Sunday, I forgot everything, am happy that Jesus is still my Friend. Hallelujah!
The title made me weep and drew me to Him in my mingled spirit.
Jesus is and will always be a dependable Friend and Savior to all who honestly come to Him. This is a powerful music that reassures all Christians, God bless you.

All believers in Our Dear Lord Jesus Christ, I salute you all. I've truly enjoyed each write up and I'm glad God used the composer to reach you all and also millions arround the globe. For me this song would forever make my day till He takes me. May God bless the composer and remember him when His kingdom shall come.

My favourite song since my childhood days; any time I listen to it, I get connected and spiritually find myself at the feet of Jesus experiencing divine care, guidance and rest. I bless the Lord for the writer and the lyrics.

Just now Lord let me see something about myself. But thank You Lord, I have found a Friend in You. Lord cleanse me and make me fully whole with You. Thank You Lord for everything. Everything is for me to see myself and know You more. Lord, be everything to me. Thank You for being my Friend! How sweet, how fresh, how marvelous You are, my Friend.

Thanks to hymnal.net and to all you good Christians around the globe. I remember my parents singing this song in duet as we drove along during my childhood. What a spiritual boost to hear it again.. BUT I remember the later line different..Instead of the "Apple tree of Apples" I recall it as "He's the Lily of the Valley, the Bright and Morning Star."
God's love to you all.
JIM
Thank You Jesus this heavenly grace and promise last forever.

Indeed He is the lily of the valley, the bright and the morning star, a Friend who sticketh closer than a brother. The lyrics of the hymn just lifted me up and placed my feet on higher ground. I know His mighty arm holds me as I walk through the valley of the shadow of death. Nothing can harm me as long as Jesus the Nazarene is my Friend.
Wav.... Superb tune and lyrics.. :) :)!!!!!!!

I am blessed with this song, this is wonderful piece both the lyric and the music, amazing, soothing, and uplifting. God bless the composer and author and his generation, may they experience bliss in the one and only God Jesus Christ of Nazareth.

It's good to know that we have found a friend in Jesus, I was just worried inside me all I remember from my worring is I have found a friend in Jesus. The more I sing this song my soul rejoice; I feel great inside me. What I know for sure is that, my Jesus won't forget me no matter what and my fellow friends hang in there our Saviour is here right now. And Jesus will surely reward us with good. Remember to come back to Christ even if you think you are the worst sinner, Jesus is waiting.

I was trying to comfort a friend who lost a very dear and long time friend and the words to this song came to my memory. I wanted to remember all the lyrics, so found this site. What a blessing to hear the testimonies of brothers and sisters all over the globe. Indeed what a wonderful friend we have in Jesus. Praise God for the salvation given through His Son Jesus. Love you all and I pray for God's blessing and protection in your lives.

A reassuring song that the only 'loving' friend is Jesus, none else. Preaching on the altar and ending the preaching with this song and seeing tears flowing from people's eyes in very sober mood got me religiously attached to this song. I believe all my burdens are gone. Praise the Lord Jesus.

I was heavily burdened in my heart today because of the situation I am going through but while I listen to this song I gained reassurance from my burden bearer (Jesus Christ) who is able to do all things to His glory. Praise be to His name.

I grew up listenting to this song. I am more familar with a slower country version but I can't seem to find the female artist. I glad I knew this song as a kid because it keeps reminding me of God's love and the relationship He wants with us.

I just woke up around 3.00 am singing this very song. Though I did not remember the wordings, the urge, the awesomeness of it made me to goggle the first line of the song and I got it. Before going to bed the previous night, I had a burden in my heart of disappointment from someone I least expected, but the good Lord gave me this song just to console me. I bless the name of the Lord, for I know He cares.

This song came to me this morning while waiting for my colleagues to start off the day's work. I googled a phrase in the hymn and found myself clicking the link to this site to get the full lyrics. Am not sure what is about to happen. But being currently miles away from home (in Bangalore, India), it may be that He wants to reassure me of His constant presence - no matter where I am anywhere on the globe.

I had a strong urge and an unwavering compulsion to sing this song. I have sang it in the past but the urge had never been like what led me to this website. First, I listened to the lyrics and it appears as if I have never paid the desirable attention to the song. I am still listening to the song been played on the web site, yet the initial urge is still gaining momentum. The song is a substance to my faith.

This song is a song of reassurance. The Lord gave me this song to sing in my revelation this morning. This song re-emphasized the Master's support and backing in whatever He orders us to do. It is a song of one of the attributes of God, His Omnipresence.
A sister requested this song at a meeting once. She said she sang it everyday to school when she was younger. It's an encouraging song.

If anyone wants to find out what a true definition of a friend is, either as an exercise to determine whether that person can truly call himself a friend to another person, or to measure whether a so called friend is a friend indeed, one only have to sing this song and the answer will readily be apparent. Tell me which friend can lay his life down for another even when that person is not faithful- a big gamble, yet Jesus paid the price and died for us while we were yet sinners. This is what this song mean to me...
It is most inspiring as mighty source of comfort and encouragement.
I like this song because it reassures me that in evrything there is a Big friend Jesus that knows everthing about me and with Him beside me I can do all things.
Going through wild and tough times in a strange land far from home. This song tells me that the greatest friend and comforter (JESUS) is always with me ANY TIME AND ANYWHERE.
The best of all my hymns. It encourages me that by Jesus alone, I must surely get to the goal I am pursuing. I sing it regularly and recommend it to everybody.
This is an inspirational song that let you know that you are not alone in your struggles and troubles.
This song is inspiring and draws one closer to the Creator. I love it.
I remember using it during my wedding day, it realy encourage me when everybody backed me I realized that God will always be ever near.
This hymn keeps me going on. Embedded in it is the timeless truth of God's person. It is absolutely soul-inspiring.
I woke up this morning singing this song. I have received courage that I am not alone. Surely, my day is made by this song.
I love this song so much because I realize that there's a Friend that is always there for me!! Hallelujah!
I like this song because I've found a friend. I need to learn to have HIM as my everything.
I like this song because of the tune.
